name: Slack - Improve Replies Concept
description:
Hey guys! 


Since the beginning of pandemic the number of messages everywhere has increased dramatically. Not sure about you, but our record was a thread with 278 replies. So does that really work well?


How it started:

It may seem that Slack manages those kind of things pretty good, but apparently not when it comes to replying to a specific message in a thread.

However, as you may see on a first video, it’s not. You need a messy link inserted in your message and 2-3 replies like that make the thread terribly long and impossible to read.


How it’s going:

A simple solution that saves those valuable seconds, minutes and, ultimately, hours. A classical yet elegant reply function that allows forgetting copying links.


What do you think, useful, isn’t it?
